name: Tesla Turret Cardboard VR (WIP)
description:
This is my first attempt at a Google Cardboard VR app. It is a work in progress and feedback is appreciated. Created for Nikola Tesla's upcoming 2016 birthday celebration. Made with Unity 5.

Feedback Survey: https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/5QBFMBG

Built off of: Turret Control Project https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/en...

MUSIC "Worlds" http://opsound.org/artist/dhalius/

(Small light baking issue near the end, will try to fix this before VRChat.net celebration)
